about_the_game:
Fight For Eden is a fantasy action-RPG VR game where you will follow the story of a young orc enrolled to fight against the half elves' oppression.

  • VR Skills: Specific actions done by the player in real life translated as impressive skills in the virtual world. Twist of faith, twist of death, earth shaker.

  • Combat: Can use multiple melee weapons and shield. Think at strategies on how to approach multiple enemies, overcome their abilities and guide your team to achieve victory.

  • Weapons: multiple melee weapons with different attributes unlocked as the story progresses.

  • Story: Explore the history of Asquebesc region, speak with charismatic characters to find untold secrets about their lives and relationships.

content_descriptors.notes: Some characters are being dressed in loincloths only. First person close up fighting.

detailed_description:
Patch 0.1

- Add bow as player weapon.
- Add material strength. Arrow can now completely pierce combatant body and shields, get stuck in or being deflected by them. Ex: a wooden arrow cannot completely pierce an iron shield and in most cases it will be deflected; an iron arrow will have a higher chance to completely pierce a wooden shield and hit the body behind it.
- Add spiked iron shield.
- Fix several bugs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 1070
  • Storage: 5.9 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: Required Oculus Rift or Rift S, Oculus Touch Controllers
